meanings.definition: Unwilling to give or spend money; miserly
meanings.sent1: He became even stingier after losing his job.
meanings.sent2: She is known for being stingier than her siblings.
meanings.sent3: The stingier he got, the more his friends teased him about it.
meanings.sent4: Her stingier nature was like a locked treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The stingier he became, the lonelier he felt.

meanings.definition: Showing a reluctance to give or spend money; tightfisted
meanings.sent1: The stingier man refused to buy anything unnecessary.
meanings.sent2: She grew stingier with each passing year.
meanings.sent3: His stingier habits made his family laugh at his thriftiness.
meanings.sent4: The stingier she became, the more her savings grew.
meanings.sent5: Being stingier than usual, he declined the invitation to dinner.
